name: MasterCook
description:
Experiment and find the correct recipe ingredients for the best meals as a top chef in 5 levels with increasing difficulty.

Instructions:

  • Try out various combinations of ingredients in order to get the taste just right.
  • Order of ingredients does matter.
  • You'll get hints as to what ingredients you should change entirely or just switch their order in the recipe.

The game was inspired by a famous board game Mastermind where the goal is to find correct combinations and crack the code.

Known issues:

  • Audio mixer in HTML export seems to be laggy and occasional sound hiccups occur.
